metadata.title: AI FileSense - AI-Powered File Organization for Windows
metadata.description: Finally organize your Desktop, Documents, and Downloads without uploading anything to the cloud. Smart AI classification that respects your privacy.

footer.tagline: AI-powered file organization for Windows. Your files stay on your computer — only filenames are sent to AI for smart classification.

hero.badge: Your files never leave your computer
hero.title: AI-Powered File Organization for Windows
hero.subtitle: Finally organize your Desktop, Documents, and Downloads — without uploading anything to the cloud.

problems.title: Sound Familiar?
problems.problem1: Hundreds of files dumped on your Desktop
problems.problem2: Can never find that document you need
problems.problem3: Tried organizing but gave up after 10 minutes
problems.problem4: Don't want to upload personal files to the cloud

solution.title: Meet AI FileSense
solution.subtitle: Smart organization that respects your privacy
solution.step1Desc: Point it at your Desktop, Documents, or Downloads folder
solution.step2Desc: See exactly how AI would organize your files before anything moves
solution.step3Desc: One click to a clean, organized computer with full undo support

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Powerful features that keep your files private
features.smartAIDesc: AI understands your files by content, not just filename. Tax docs, medical records, work projects — automatically sorted.
features.localPrivateDesc: Your files never leave your computer. Only filenames and small snippets go to AI — never full file contents.
features.undoDesc: Made a mistake? Reverse any organization instantly. Full transaction history lets you go back to any previous state.
features.bilingualDesc: Full bilingual support. Use AI FileSense in English or Spanish (Mexico) — your choice.
features.fastDesc: Incremental indexing means only changed files are re-scanned. Batch AI processing keeps costs low.
features.freeDesc: Get started at no cost. Unlimited scanning, full features, one-click undo — all free for your first 1,000 files.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you need more
pricing.apiCostNote: You provide your own Anthropic API key. Estimated AI cost: ~$0.50-1.00 per 1,000 files.

cta.title: Ready for a Cleaner Desktop?
cta.subtitle: Download AI FileSense and start organizing in minutes. No account needed, no files uploaded.

hero.title: Smart File Organization, Zero Cloud Upload
hero.subtitle: See how AI FileSense brings intelligent organization to your local files

aiClassification.title: AI-Powered Classification
aiClassification.subtitle: AI reads filenames and small text snippets to understand what each file is — then suggests the perfect folder.

organizationStyles.title: Three Ways to Organize
organizationStyles.subtitle: Choose the style that fits your workflow
organizationStyles.style1Desc: Organize by life domains: Work, Personal, Finance, Health, etc.
organizationStyles.style2Desc: Sort files by year and month for chronological access.
organizationStyles.style3Desc: Fast categorization into Documents, Images, Downloads, etc.

privacy.title: Privacy by Design
privacy.subtitle: Your files never leave your computer
privacy.localDesc: All your actual files, full contents, and personal data
privacy.aiDesc: Only filenames and small text snippets for classification

search.title: Find Files by Describing Them
search.subtitle: Search using natural language instead of exact filenames

apiCosts.title: About API Costs
apiCosts.subtitle: You bring your own Anthropic API key
apiCosts.howItWorksDesc: AI FileSense uses Claude AI for smart classification. You provide your own API key, so you only pay for what you use.

faq.title: Pricing FAQ
faq.q1: Why do I need my own API key?
faq.a1: This keeps your costs low and gives you full control. There are no hidden fees or subscriptions beyond the Pro tier.
faq.q2: How do I get an API key?
faq.a2: Sign up at anthropic.com, add billing info, and generate an API key. We have a step-by-step guide in the app.
faq.q3: What if I hit my file limit?
faq.a3: You can still scan and search, but new AI classifications will pause until you upgrade or the month resets.
faq.a4: Yes, within 30 days of purchase if you're not satisfied.
faq.a5: Not yet, but it's on our roadmap. Contact us if you're interested.
faq.a6: We offer discounts for students, educators, and nonprofits. Contact us with proof of eligibility.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about AI FileSense

general.a1: AI FileSense is a Windows desktop application that uses AI to intelligently organize your files. It analyzes filenames and small text snippets to suggest the best folder structure for your documents.
general.a2: Yes! The free tier includes AI classification for up to 1,000 files, unlimited local scanning, all organization styles, and one-click undo. You only pay for the AI API usage.
general.a3: AI FileSense supports Windows 10 (64-bit) and Windows 11.

privacy.q1: Do my files get uploaded to the cloud?
privacy.a1: No. Your files never leave your computer. Only filenames and small text snippets are sent to the AI for classification.
privacy.q2: What data does the AI see?
privacy.a2: The AI receives filenames and optional small text snippets (first 500 characters). It never sees full file contents, images, or personal documents.
privacy.q3: Is my API key stored securely?
privacy.a3: Yes. Your API key is encrypted and stored locally on your machine. It's never sent to our servers.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe file organization shouldn't require uploading your personal data to the cloud. AI FileSense brings the power of AI to your local files, keeping your data where it belongs — on your computer.
